channel.title: Will a linux VPS do?
channel.description:
Will a linux VPS handle a server??? or does it have to be windows???
(Cuz linux is cheaper lol so... well only trying to save money ;))

item.title: Will a linux VPS do?
item.dc:creator: @bburton31 bburton31
item.description:
@bburton31 wrote:

[quote=“MoparRocksScape, post:8, topic:80980”][quote author=Zenzie link=topic=118980.msg1168718#msg1168718 date=1176767123]
Lol noobs never understand it even if you explain it propperly
[/quote]
“LOL NOOBS NEVER UNDERSTAND IT EVEN IF YOU EXPLAIN IT PROPERLY” isn’t a way to help, why didn’t you even bother posting if you were going to say something mean? He is a bigginer at this, and people can sometimes just not be detailed enough to help.

~Mike[/quote]

Wow thanks, i thought it was just me… well if no-one knows then i spose it doesn’t matter… so know one has ever worked with linux??? So zerofreeze you said “noobs don’t understand even if you explain properly” and you haven’t even explained properly in the first place. So i suggest you do. Uness of course you don’t know :D. Anyway, i’ll just keep checking any new replies i get and hope someone has the answe lol!
